text: ai eemaan laanevaalo! tumamen se jo koee apane dharm se phirega to allaah jald hee aise logon ko laega jinase use prem hoga aur jo usase prem karenge. ve eemaanavaalon ke prati naram aur avishvaasiyon ke prati kathor honge. allaah kee raah mein jee-tod koshish karenge aur kisee bhartsana karanevaale kee bhartsana se na darenge. yah allaah ka udaar anugrah hai, jise chaahata hai pradaan karata hai. allaah badee samaeevaala, sarvagy hai
